title: New Team looking for Members.
body: We are looking for gold or lower players to be in our team. We will be practicing every week, and once I feel like the team has had enough practice to be at a high level, we will apply for tourneys as a group. Must be able to show devotion while you are here for practice. We are looking for a capable mid laner, and a top laner. Comment below if interested. We don't take smurfs, and people who are plat plus. We will have VOD reviews, and feedback after games. Tryouts start on saturday 6pm est.

replies.body: hey im interested. Gold IV mid. ign is yodahk

> [{quoted}](name=yodahk,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=G10mTeWg,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2017-08-31T23:02:58.963+0000)
>
> hey im interested. Gold IV mid. ign is yodahk

Same goes to you, you will be trying out for a position at mid. be present at 6pm est, this saturday. msg me if you can not make it on that time. otherwise be punctual.

I'm interested and main both mid and top, feel free to add me and also I attached my record (check ranked only because I don't take norms seriously it's just where i mess around with new champs)  https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=photosyndicate

> [{quoted}](name=PhotoSyndicate,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=G10mTeWg,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-08-31T14:25:37.191+0000)
>
> I'm interested and main both mid and top, feel free to add me and also I attached my record (check ranked only because I don't take norms seriously it's just where i mess around with new champs)  https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=photosyndicate

You will be trying out for a position at top on saturday 6pm est. msg me on league if you can not make it. Be on time otherwise.
I forgot to mention, I would like the team members to have discord, for team comms in game. We will have shotcalling so that everyone is on the same page.
Interested in ADC :) Add me. ign: Mr Otter
Gold 5, i can play top or mid - ign - CupCakeo
I sent him a friend request on league, so if that is the case, he can explain it himself lol.

> [{quoted}](name=SpelingMistakee,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=G10mTeWg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-31T08:09:47.534+0000)
>
> Yoo I can fill {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

We are looking for starters, not subs. Also, we need people to list if they want top or mid.
